snippet: The ferry, built in 1965 and decommissioned in 2007, began taking on water Friday at an upstate dock, though officials do not know why.
abstract: Former Staten Island Ferry, decommissioned in 2007 and kept at a dock owned by Steelways Inc in Newburgh, NY, springs leak and begins to tilt and take on water; authorities say boat may need to be dismantled.
lead_paragraph: The ferry, built in 1965 and decommissioned in 2007, began taking on water Friday at an upstate dock, though officials do not know why.

headline.seo: Former S.I. Ferry Springs Leak and Lists
headline.main: Former Staten Island Ferry Springs Leak and Lists
headline.print_headline: Erstwhile S.I. Ferry Springs Leak, Then Lists
